question: 5) Energy – Multiple Choice Researchers at Thomas Jefferson National Accelerator Facility recently completed the 12 giga-electron-volt upgrade of the Continuous Electron Beam Accelerator Facility. To which of the following does the 12 giga-electron-volts best correspond? answer: Z) KINETIC ENERGY OF THE ELECTRONS

answer:
W) THE SUM OF THE PARTIAL PRESSURES OF EACH GAS IS EQUAL TO
THE TOTAL PRESSURE
